privacy.introduction: At E-PDF's, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our free online PDF tools at e-pdfs.com. By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect minimal information necessary to provide our services: (a) Automatically collected data: browser type, device type, operating system, IP address (anonymized), page views, and referral source; (b) Cookies: essential cookies for site functionality and third-party cookies for advertising (see Cookie section); (c) Contact form data: if you contact us, we collect your name, email, and message content. IMPORTANT: We do NOT collect, access, store, or process any PDF files or documents. All file processing occurs entirely in your browser.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use collected information to: (a) Provide and improve our services; (b) Analyze website usage patterns to enhance user experience; (c) Display relevant advertisements through Google AdSense; (d) Respond to your inquiries and support requests; (e) Comply with legal obligations. We never use your data to track your document content or personal files.

storage.title: 3. File Processing & Storage
storage.content: This is our most important privacy feature: YOUR FILES NEVER LEAVE YOUR DEVICE. All PDF processing (merging, splitting, compressing, converting, etc.) happens entirely within your web browser using JavaScript. Your documents are: (a) Never uploaded to any server; (b) Never stored on our systems; (c) Never accessed by us or third parties; (d) Automatically cleared from browser memory when you close the tab. This browser-based approach ensures complete privacy and security for your sensitive documents.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies for: (a) Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality, language preferences, and user settings; (b) Analytics cookies: Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site (anonymized); (c) Advertising cookies: Google AdSense uses cookies to display relevant ads. These may include DoubleClick DART cookies that track browsing across websites. You can control cookies through your browser settings or our cookie consent banner. Disabling cookies may affect site functionality.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services: (a) Google AdSense: For displaying advertisements. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your visits to this and other websites. You can opt out at www.aboutads.info or Google Ad Settings; (b) Google Analytics: For website analytics (anonymized IP addresses); (c) Content Delivery Networks: For fast page loading. These services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review them.

gdpr.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR & CCPA)
gdpr.content: Under GDPR, CCPA, and similar regulations, you have the right to: (a) Access: Request a copy of data we hold about you; (b) Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data; (c) Erasure: Request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten'); (d) Restriction: Request limitation of data processing; (e) Portability: Receive your data in a portable format; (f) Objection: Object to certain processing activities; (g) Withdraw consent: Withdraw previously given consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@e-pdfs.com.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: E-PDF's is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately at contact@e-pdfs.com, and we will take steps to delete such information.

security.title: 8. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures, including: (a) SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission; (b) Regular security audits and updates; (c) Limited access to any stored data; (d) Secure hosting infrastructure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 9. Data Retention
retention.content: Since we don't store your PDF files, there is no file data to retain. For other data: (a) Analytics data: Retained for up to 26 months; (b) Contact form submissions: Retained until your inquiry is resolved, then deleted within 12 months; (c) Cookie preferences: Stored locally on your device. You can clear this data at any time through your browser settings.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content: Our website and services are hosted internationally. If you access E-PDF's from outside our hosting region, your information may be transferred across borders. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for any international data transfers in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at: Email: contact@e-pdfs.com. We aim to respond to all privacy requests within 30 days. For EU residents, you also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local supervisory authority.

contact.faq1Question: Is E-PDF's really free to use?
contact.faq1Answer: Yes! All our PDF tools are completely free to use with no hidden fees, subscriptions, or usage limits. We're supported by non-intrusive advertising, which allows us to offer all features at no cost.
contact.faq2Question: Are my files secure and private?
contact.faq2Answer: Absolutely. Your files are processed 100% locally in your web browser. They are NEVER uploaded to our servers or any cloud storage. This means we have zero access to your documents, ensuring complete privacy for sensitive files.
contact.faq3Question: What file formats do you support?
contact.faq3Answer: We support a wide range of formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, Word (DOC, DOCX), Excel (XLS, XLSX), PowerPoint (PPT, PPTX), and more. Check our All Tools page for the complete list of supported conversions.
